title: New patch :/

embed.description: Dragon Souls are a new end-game payoff for the team who wins the Elemental Drake game, a powerful reward that's similar to an Epic objective. Dragon Souls don't offer the same moment-to-moment strength as Baron or Elder buff, but they're permanent and an additional bonus on top of the drake stacks their bearers already earned.

replies.body:
1. Edit this thread and remove all emojis, pictures, and unneeded information.

2. Let me know when you have done this and I will offer some feedback.
